title: Guardians of the Prehistoric Jungle
description: In a lush prehistoric world, a massive Titanoboa slithers through ancient landscapes, while a Gigantopithecus protects a vulnerable tiger cub from a pack of aggressive hyenas. The story follows their interconnected journey of survival and unexpected alliances amidst a vibrant, dangerous ecosystem.

visual_style.art_style: Realistic CGI with high detail, blending fantastical elements into a prehistoric setting. The creatures are rendered with intricate textures and lifelike movements.
visual_style.color_palette: Dominant greens and browns from the dense foliage and earthy terrain, accented by bright blues of the sky and the vibrant colors of waterfalls and rainbows. Warm sunlight often bathes the scenes.
visual_style.lighting: Natural daylight, often featuring dramatic shafts of sunlight filtering through the dense canopy, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. Shadows are soft but defined.
visual_style.quality: 8K resolution, cinematic quality, smooth animation, with a clean and polished aesthetic.

characters.name: Titanoboa
characters.description: An impossibly large, ancient snake, resembling a massive anaconda or python. Its scales are a mix of earthy browns, olive greens, and dark diamond patterns. It has piercing yellow eyes and large, visible fangs. It emits visible vapor or smoke from its nostrils when agitated, indicating its immense power.
characters.size_reference: Over 100 feet long, thick as a tree trunk.

characters.name: Gigantopithecus
characters.description: A large, powerfully built gorilla-like hominid covered in thick, dark grey to black fur. It has intelligent, expressive eyes and a formidable muscular physique. It walks bipedally and carries a crudely fashioned spear with a large stone tip, showcasing its intelligence and strength.

characters.name: Tiger Cub
characters.description: A young tiger cub with distinctive orange and black stripes. It is small and initially appears vulnerable, but can display typical feline aggression when threatened, reflecting its wild nature.
characters.size_reference: Size of a domestic cat to a small dog.

characters.name: Giant Tortoise
characters.description: An enormous, ancient tortoise with a thick, heavily textured shell partially covered in moss and vines. It moves slowly and deliberately, embodying wisdom and resilience.

characters.name: Prehistoric Hyenas
characters.description: A pack of large, stocky, spotted hyena-like creatures with powerful jaws and a menacing demeanor. They move as a coordinated group, displaying pack hunting behavior with aggressive snarls and barks. Their fur is a mottled brown and cream.
characters.size_reference: Larger than modern hyenas, approximately 4-5 feet at the shoulder.

characters.name: Cheetah Cub
characters.description: A small, slender cheetah cub with distinctive black spots on a light brown coat. It is agile and curious, representing the innocence and vulnerability of the wild.

locations.name: Mountainous Jungle Valley
locations.description: A vast, vibrant tropical jungle characterized by towering, mist-shrouded mountains, dense green foliage, and cascading waterfalls. The air is clear and the environment feels ancient and untouched, brimming with life.

locations.name: River and Waterfall
locations.description: A powerful, wide river culminating in a colossal waterfall, creating a misty spray where a vibrant rainbow often forms. The surrounding banks are lush with tropical vegetation, highlighting the raw beauty and power of nature.

locations.name: Ancient Forest Floor
locations.description: A primeval forest floor dominated by enormous, ancient trees with thick, gnarled trunks and sprawling root systems. The ground is covered in lush ferns and rich undergrowth, with shafts of sunlight piercing through the dense canopy, creating a magical, yet wild atmosphere.

locations.name: Volcanic Savanna
locations.description: A sprawling savanna landscape with golden grasslands, dotted by majestic, ancient baobab-like trees. In the distance, a smoking volcano hints at geological activity, adding an element of danger to the expansive, sun-drenched plains.
